kukit.js - 1.2 Released 2007-08-17

    - Move ;;; markers to first columns.
      [gotcha]

    - Fix credits.
      [gotcha]

    - Fix identifiers to have coherent styling (CamelCase).
      [gotcha]

    - Some refactoring to allow Firekiss plugin.
      [gotcha]

    - Fit code on 80 columns.
      [gotcha]

    - Cleaned up error messages.
      [gotcha]
